end_date.value: date when the project implementation is completed

start_date.value: date when the project implementation begins

duration.value: total amount of days between the start and end date

sus_plan.value: a description of their sustainability plan

total_cost.value: total funding required by the project

num_houses.value: number of houses in the village

co2.value: number of co2 predicted emissions avoided

pue.value: a description of the productive uses of energy the project hopes to bring

ppl.value: number of people in the village
